snippet: Nick Balletta is the chief executive of TalkPoint, which provides technology and services for interactive webcasting and virtual meetings. He is not a Four Seasons kind of guy, more of a Two Seasons.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features TalkPoint chief executive Nick Balletta discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Nick Balletta is the chief executive of TalkPoint, which provides technology and services for interactive webcasting and virtual meetings. He is not a Four Seasons kind of guy, more of a Two Seasons.

headline.main: Tight With a Dollar, but Expansive in Spirit
headline.print_headline: Tight With a Dollar, But Expansive in Spirit
